formula: a(n+1) = n*10^{floor[1+log10(a(n))]+floor[1+log10(n)]}+a(n)*10^floor[1+log10(n)]+n, with a(1)=1. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 04 2008
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,b,i; a:=1; b:=0; print(a); for i from 1 by 1 to n do b:=a; a:=(i+1)*10^(2+floor(evalf(log10(b),10))+floor(evalf(log10(i+1),10)))+b*10^(1+floor(evalf(log10(i+1),10)))+i+1; print(a); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 04 2008
mathematica: Table[d = Flatten[IntegerDigits /@ Range@ n]; FromDigits@ Flatten[{Reverse@ d, Rest@ d}, 1], {n, 11}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 20 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = s = ""; forstep (k=n,1,-1, s = concat(s, k)); for (k=2, n, s = concat(s, k)); eval(s); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 20 2015
